sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Apple ( AAPL ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Apple has lost about 0.6% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 2.0%.
Caterpillar is showing a gain of 4.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.9%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
